meanings.sent1: The billionth star in the sky shone brightly.
meanings.sent2: She found the billionth book on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The billionth cookie in the jar was a surprise treat.
meanings.sent5: The billionth drop of rain brought relief to the dry land.

meanings.definition: The fraction equal to one divided by one billion.
meanings.sent1: He had only a billionth of the cake left.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a billionth of a teaspoon of salt.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a billionth of a second lasted forever.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, each fish was a billionth of the whole.
meanings.sent5: The scientist discovered a billionth of a new element in the sample.
